description: This file defines a Flutter widget named DashboardScreen that displays fleet statistics such as total vehicles, active vehicles, and vehicles under maintenance. It uses provider for state management and includes animations and custom theming.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the fleet dashboard screen.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing animations and UI of DashboardScreen.

methods.name: _kpiCard
methods.description: Builds a KPI card displaying a label, value, and color.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes animation controller and triggers loading of dashboard stats after first frame.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of animation controller to free resources.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree including animated fade transition and KPI cards.
